Uses of Class
CoronaTest.Date

    • Uses of Date in CoronaTest

      Fields in CoronaTest declared as Date 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private Date Person.birthDate
      the date of birth of this person
      private Date CoronaTest.testDate
      The date on which this test was performed.
      Methods in CoronaTest that return Date 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Date Person.getBirthDate()
      get the date of birth of this person.
      Date CoronaTest.getTestDate()
      get the date of this test.
      Implemented as a defensive getter, that is, it returns a copy of the date held by this corona-test.
      Date AntigenTest.validUntil()
      retrieve the date until the result of this corona-test is considered valid.
      abstract Date CoronaTest.validUntil()
      retrieve the date until the result of this corona-test is considered valid.
      Date PcrTest.validUntil()
      retrieve the date until the result of this corona-test is considered valid.
      Methods in CoronaTest with parameters of type Date 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int Date.compareTo​(Date d)
      Compares this date to another date.
      String Person.coronaStatus​(Date date)
      Retrieves a textual representation of the corona-status of this person on a given date.
      CoronaTest Person.lastTestBeforeDate​(Date testsBefore)
      retrieves the corona-test of this person which is closest to, but before, a given date.
      If no such test exists null is returned.
      static void Main.printPersons​(Person[] persons, Date d)
      Print the corona-status for several persons for a given date.
      void Person.setBirthDate​(Date birthDate)
      set the date of birth of this person.
      Only non-null arguments are accepted.
      Constructors in CoronaTest with parameters of type Date 
      Constructor Description
      AntigenTest​(Date testDate, boolean isPositive)
      constructs an antigen-test for a specific date and with a specific result
      for simplicity, arguments are not validated
      CoronaTest​(Date testDate, boolean isPositive)
      constructs a corona-test for a specific date and with a specific result
      for simplicity, arguments are not validated
      Date​(Date date)
      Copy constructor
      PcrTest​(Date testDate, boolean isPositive)
      constructs a pcr-test for a specific date and with a specific result
      for simplicity, arguments are not validated
      Person​(String name, Date birthDate, CoronaTest[] tests)
      creates person.
